TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartDescriptionCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartDescriptionCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Consists of a collection of objects to be used with catalogs of controls. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>類別由各種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>他們的實作中的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法。 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>中所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>建立物件。 此物件維護的相關基本資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，包括其識別碼、 標題、 其描述，以及相關聯的圖示路徑。 各種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件，以顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項的資訊在目錄中，而不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制本身。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>由 Web 組件控制項設定為維護所有的集合類別在內部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>用於目錄中的物件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>集合只適用於頁面是在類別目錄的顯示模式。 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>呈現控制項，會循環<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>集合，從每個加入資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>要顯示的類別目錄物件。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式可以用來建立空的集合。 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制項建立空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>物件匯入的描述檔案的內容是否`null`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartDescriptions) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of objects that correspond to the controls in a catalog.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>建構函式由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法實作內各種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項建立的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件。

Docs.exception: A member of is -or- A member of is not an object of type -or- A member of has a duplicate property

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法很有用，當您想要組合可以包含自訂陣列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法會很有用，如果您有多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件，以及您需要知道一個物件相對於其他的序數位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Item%2A>索引子可讓您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>根據唯一識別項的集合。
